name: This Gig is not OK
description:
It would be against the spirit of emo for your gig to be too OK, so slam that guitar but not too badly or not too well.

Play a song. Press the arrow keys in time to match the music.

Don't let your "OK" bar get too low or too high.

Press R to restart.

I'm so sorry I didn't use real MCR music copyright things scare me I used some random track of mine from 5 years ago cause that's close enough to emo imo

A game by Hannah, for the Killjoys My Chemical Romance game jam
